title: Domestic banks and NBFCs increase exposure to Adani Group to 36% of total debt
description: Domestic banks and non-banking financial companies raised their exposure to the Adani Group to 36% of its total debt by March 2024, lending ₹88,100 crore. The group’s debt increased due to capital expenditures in airports and green energy. However, a 45% rise in operating profit helped reduce its net debt-to-operating profit ratio to its lowest in six years at 2.19 times, down from 3.27 times a year earlier.
